title: What is the font?
content:
Can someone help me know what font is used in the image attached?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled1_5652.jpg)
author: SheetalSharma

comments.content:
I trust you will get a good answer if you post your request at the Font Identification forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192641/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Look forward to seeing you there.  
Don
